summary: This document is an email chain from February 2020, primarily consisting of a victim's complaint to the FBI. The victim expresses frustration at not receiving a response to previous attempts to file an official complaint against the FBI for its alleged involvement with Jeffrey Epstein and the victim's own trafficking. The victim threatens to take the matter to an international level and share evidence with journalists. The chain also includes earlier emails from FBI Victim Services attempting to coordinate therapy for the victim.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: Former U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Mentioned by the victim as having stood on the same steps where the victim was raped and trafficked, and accused of lying to the public and victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE' by the victim, who claims evidence implicates him and co-conspirators, and criticizes lack of support for his victims.

connections.description: The victim's complaint links them contextually, alleging Berman failed victims while Epstein was the perpetrator.

events.title: FBI attempts to coordinate call with victim
events.description: An FBI agent emails the victim asking for a good contact number to call the next day (January 31) to discuss therapy coordination.

events.title: FBI provides medical services list
events.description: An FBI Victim Services Manager emails the victim a complete medical list, including psychological services, and offers to assist in choosing a therapist.

events.title: Victim demands response and threatens international investigation
events.description: The victim sends an angry email demanding a response from the FBI, accusing them of involvement with Epstein and failure to support victims, and threatens to launch an international investigation.

keyFacts: A victim alleges being raped and trafficked on the same steps where former U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman stood, accusing him of lying to the public and victims.
The victim claims to possess evidence implicating the FBI in Jeffrey Epstein's activities and their own trafficking, and states this evidence has been sent to journalists worldwide.
The victim expresses repeated frustration at unsuccessful attempts to file an official complaint against the FBI directly, demanding formal procedures to do so.
The email chain shows prior FBI Victim Services outreach to the victim in January 2020, focusing on coordinating psychological therapy.
The victim announces an intent to pursue an international investigation against the FBI, escalating the complaint beyond U.S. channels.
